name: Jim Walks Into A Junkyard
description:
On channel 3, you can watch Jim take a shortcut and encounter a nasty bunch of junkyard monsters. Jim's fate is upt to you. 

Unfortunately, you don't have much to fight with. You find a machine and some guns, and you craft makeshift ammo with the pieces of junk you find in heaps or crates.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Click to shoot
  • E to rummage
  • Q to throw
  • Scroll wheel to switch weapon

Instructions:

  • E to rummage int the piles of garbage you find around the junkyard.
  • Touch the trash to pick the pieces up
  • Look in the top left to see the items you are holding
  • Q to throw items you are holding
  • Walk to the autocrafter at the bottom of the screen and throw materials in to craft bullets
  • Some materials are very useful for making bullets for a specific weapon
  • Once you have bullets, you can shoot with Left click
  • Keep an eye on your bullet levels, you don't want to run out!

Have fun and thanks for playing!

The music is from PlusMusic, and Artificial Intelligence music augmenter.
